question: Which company has completed the sale of its 50 per cent stake in GIFT City to the Gujarat government?
explanation:
Debt-ridden IL&FS announced that it has completed the sale of its 50 per cent stake in GIFT (Gujarat International Finance Tec-City) City to the Gujarat government.
The sale has generated over Rs 32 crore for its equity value. It has also reduced its consolidated debt by more than Rs 1,200 crore. Gujarat Urban Development Company Ltd (GUDCL) is the owner of the remaining 50% stake in GIFTCL. It has offered to purchase IL&FS's share in GIFTCL.
